meanings.definition: A musical instrument consisting of a set of wooden bars struck with mallets to produce musical tones.
meanings.sent1: The marimbas in the band created beautiful music.
meanings.sent2: She learned to play the marimbas in music class.
meanings.sent3: The marimbas decided to start a band and play at the park.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the marimbas echoed through the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The wooden bars of the marimbas resonated with pure tones.
